TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InstancePersistenceContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示在执行永久性命令时的执行状态信息。

span.span: Represents execution state information while a persistence command is being executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的一个实例将传递到永久性提供程序实现的 TryCommand 方法。An instance of this class is passed to the TryCommand method of persistence provider implementations. 永久性提供程序使用此类来检查实例的内存中视图，并指示对外部存储的操作的结果，这些结果可能影响该视图或其他内存中上下文。Persistence providers use this class to inspect the in-memory view of the instance as well as indicate the results of operations on the external store which may affect the view or other in-memory context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssociatedInstanceKey(valuetype System.Guid key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 已关联的键的实例键标识符。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key that has been associated.

param.span: 不得是 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经成功将某个键与实例存储中的当前实例关联。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully associated a key to the current instance in the instance store.

summary.span: 该键的标识符将指定为参数。

span.span: The identifier of the key is specified as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例键必须是非关联的。The instance key must be unassociated. 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例以及该实例上的锁。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginBindReclaimedLock (long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginBindReclaimedLock(int64 instanceVersion, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginBindReclaimedLock (instanceVersion As Long, timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginBindReclaimedLock(long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
member this.BeginBindReclaimedLock : int64 * TimeSpan * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: instanceVersion
param.span: 对实例所持有的锁的版本，或为零（如果永久性提供程序不实现锁版本管理）。

span.span: The version of the lock held on the instance, or zero if the persistence provider does not implement lock versions.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 异步操作的超时时间。

span.span: The timeout period for the asynchronous operation.

param.name: callback
param.span: 操作完成时将要调用的方法。

span.span: The method to be called when the operation is completed.

param.name: state
param.span: 与异步操作关联的状态信息。

span.span: The state information associated with the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 开始异步操作以将实例上的现有锁绑定到当前实例句柄。

span.span: Begin an asynchronous operation to bind an existing lock on an instance to the current instance handle.

summary.span: 现有锁的版本将作为参数传递。

span.span: The version of the existing lock is passed as a parameter.
The status of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试获取锁时，永久性提供程序可确定当前实例已在当前存储中锁定。When attempting to acquire a lock, the persistence provider may decide that the current instance is already locked in the current store. 如果锁定标记与当前句柄的锁定标记匹配，则永久性提供程序可尝试通过检查其版本并将它传递到 BeginBindReclaimedLock 来回收锁。If the lock token matches the current handle’s lock token, then the persistence provider can attempt to reclaim the lock by inspecting its version and passing it to BeginBindReclaimedLock. 在锁得以成功回收之前，永久性提供程序不得更改实例。The persistence provider must not make changes to the instance until the lock is successfully reclaimed. 如果没有其他句柄绑定到锁，则 BeginBindReclaimedLock 操作将成功执行并且当前句柄将绑定到锁。If no other handle is bound to the lock, then the BeginBindReclaimedLock operation succeeds and the current handle becomes bound to the lock. 否则，BeginBindReclaimedLock 或 BeginBindReclaimedLock 将引发 InstanceHandleConflictException。Otherwise, BeginBindReclaimedLock or EndBindReclaimedLock throws InstanceHandleConflictException. 如果正在对其他句柄执行命令，则该操作要等待那些命令的结果以确定是否可回收锁，因而无法完成。If commands are in progress on other handles, the operation may not complete while waiting for the outcome of those commands to decide whether the lock can be reclaimed. 当前实例句柄必须绑定到一个实例和一个锁所有者。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance and a lock owner. 该实例不得已完成。The instance must not be completed. 与锁的所有者关联的锁定标记用于标识锁的所有者。The lock token associated with the lock owner is used to identify the owner of the lock. 一旦一个锁绑定到一个句柄，它就会在该句柄的整个生存期中一直与之绑定。Once a lock is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 锁定标记和实例版本都不可更改。Neither the lock token nor the instance version can be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginExecute (System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand command, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginExecute(class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand command, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginExecute (command As InstancePersistenceCommand, timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginExecute(System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstancePersistenceCommand ^ command, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
member this.BeginExecute : System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand * TimeSpan * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: command
param.span: 要执行的永久性命令。

span.span: The persistence command to be executed.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 此操作的超时值。

span.span: The time-out value for the operation.

param.name: callback
param.span: 该委托接收请求操作完成的异步接收的通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous receive that a request operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 状态信息。

span.span: The state information.

summary.span: 开始异步执行永久性命令。

span.span: Begins executing a persistence command asynchronously.
The status of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永久性提供程序可使用此方法将子命令作为命令的一部分执行。A persistence provider can use this method to execute sub-commands as part of a command. 子命令将使用 BeginTryCommand 执行，类似于传递到 InstanceStore.BeginExecute 的命令。The sub-command will be executed using BeginTryCommand, similar to commands passed to InstanceStore.BeginExecute. 命令可以嵌套，但是一个命令不能同时执行多个子命令。Commands can be nested, but a command must not execute more than one sub-command at a time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BindAcquiredLock(int64 instanceVersion) cil managed

param.name: instanceVersion
param.span: 对该实例所获取的锁的版本，或为零（如果永久性提供程序不实现锁版本管理）。

span.span: Version of the lock acquired on the instance, or zero if the persistence provider does not implement lock versions.

summary.span: 将对某个实例新获取的锁绑定到当前实例句柄。

span.span: Binds a newly acquired lock on an instance to the current instance handle.

summary.span: 获取的锁的版本将作为参数传递。

span.span: The version of the acquired lock is passed as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果永久性提供程序实现锁版本管理，则每次获取该实例上的锁时，外部存储中其版本都必须增加 1。If a persistence provider implements lock versioning, then each time a lock is acquired on the instance, the version must be incremented by one in the external store. 首次锁定实例时，版本应为 1。The first time the instance is locked, the version should be 1. 每次获取锁时都会使上一个锁失效。Each lock acquisition invalidates the previous lock. 当前实例句柄必须绑定到一个实例和一个锁所有者。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance and a lock owner. 该实例不得已完成。The instance must not be completed. 与锁的所有者关联的锁定标记用于标识锁的所有者The lock token associated with the lock owner is used to identify the owner of the lock 一旦一个锁绑定到一个句柄，它就会在该句柄的整个生存期中一直与之绑定。Once a lock is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 锁定标记和实例版本都不可更改。Neither the lock token nor the instance version can be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BindEvent(class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceEvent persistenceEvent) cil managed

param.name: persistenceEvent
param.span: 一个包含有关事件的信息的 对象。

span.span: An object containing information about the event.

summary.span: 将 绑定到实例句柄。

span.span: Binds an to an instance handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BindInstance(valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 一个实例标识符。

span.span: An instance identifier.

param.span: 不得是 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 绑定一个实例，其标识符指定为当前实例句柄的参数。

span.span: Binds an instance whose identifier is specified as a parameter to the current instance handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦一个实例绑定到一个句柄，它就会在该句柄的整个生存期中一直与之绑定。Once an instance is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 其他任何实例都无法绑定到该句柄。No other instance can ever be bound to the handle.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BindInstanceOwner (Guid instanceOwnerId, Guid lockToken);
.method public hidebysig instance void BindInstanceOwner(valuetype System.Guid instanceOwnerId, valuetype System.Guid lockToken) cil managed
Public Sub BindInstanceOwner (instanceOwnerId As Guid, lockToken As Guid)
public: void BindInstanceOwner(Guid instanceOwnerId, Guid lockToken);

param.name: instanceOwnerId
param.span: 实例所有者的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the instance owner.

param.name: lockToken
param.span: 实例所有者的锁定标记。

span.span: The lock token of the instance owner.

param.span: 永久性提供程序可以选择对实例所有者标识符和该所有者的锁定标记使用相同的值。

span.span: A persistence provider may choose to use the same value for the instance owner identifier and the owner’s lock token.

summary.span: 将一个实例所有者绑定到当前实例句柄。

span.span: Binds an instance owner to the current instance handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦一个实例所有者绑定到一个句柄，它就会在该句柄的整个生存期中一直与之绑定。Once an instance owner is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 其他任何实例所有者都无法绑定到该句柄。No other instance owner can ever be bound to the handle.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BindReclaimedLock (long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout);
.method public hidebysig instance void BindReclaimedLock(int64 instanceVersion, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Sub BindReclaimedLock (instanceVersion As Long, timeout As TimeSpan)
public: void BindReclaimedLock(long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout);

param.name: instanceVersion
param.span: 对实例所持有的锁的版本，或为零（如果永久性提供程序不实现锁版本管理）。

span.span: Version of the lock held on the instance, or zero if the persistence provider does not implement lock versions.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 此操作的超时值。

span.span: The time-out value for the operation.

summary.span: 将某个实例上的现有锁绑定到当前实例句柄。

span.span: Binds an existing lock on an instance to the current instance handle.

summary.span: 现有锁的版本将作为参数传递。

span.span: The version of the existing lock is passed as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试获取锁时，永久性提供程序可确定当前实例已在当前存储中锁定。When attempting to acquire a lock, the persistence provider may decide that the current instance is already locked in the current store. 如果锁定标记与当前句柄的锁定标记匹配，则永久性提供程序可尝试通过检查其版本并将它传递到 BindReclaimedLock 来回收锁。If the lock token matches the current handle’s lock token, then the persistence provider can attempt to reclaim the lock by inspecting its version and passing it to BindReclaimedLock. 在锁得以成功回收之前，永久性提供程序不得更改实例。The persistence provider must not make changes to the instance until the lock is successfully reclaimed. 如果没有其他句柄绑定到锁，则 BindReclaimedLock 将成功执行并且当前句柄将绑定到锁。If no other handle is bound to the lock, then BindReclaimedLock succeeds and the current handle becomes bound to the lock. 否则，BindReclaimedLock 将引发 InstanceHandleConflictException。Otherwise, BindReclaimedLock throws InstanceHandleConflictException. 如果正在对其他句柄执行命令，则 BindReclaimedLock 可能因为要等待那些命令的结果以确定是否可回收锁而发生阻塞。If commands are in progress on other handles, BindReclaimedLock may block waiting for the outcome of those commands before deciding whether the lock can be reclaimed. 当前实例句柄必须绑定到一个实例和一个锁所有者。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance and a lock owner. 该实例不得已完成。The instance must not be completed. 与锁的所有者关联的锁定标记用于标识锁的所有者。The lock token associated with the lock owner is used to identify the owner of the lock. 一旦一个锁绑定到一个句柄，它就会在该句柄的整个生存期中一直与之绑定。Once a lock is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 锁定标记和实例版本都不可更改。Neither the lock token nor the instance version can be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CompletedInstance() cil managed

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经成功将实例存储中的当前实例标记为完成。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully marked the current instance as complete in the instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例以及该实例上的锁。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 必须已初始化但未完成实例。The instance must be initialized and not be already completed. （如果已向某实例保存了一组实例数据，则说明该实例已初始化。）与实例关联的所有键都必须已完成。(An instance is initialized if a set of instance data has ever been persisted to it.) All of the keys associated to the instance must be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CompletedInstanceKey(valuetype System.Guid key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 已完成的键的实例键标识符。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key that has been completed.

param.span: 不得是 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经成功将外部存储中的键标记为完成。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully marked a key as complete in the external store.

summary.span: 该键的标识符将指定为参数。

span.span: The identifier of the key is specified as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例以及该实例上的锁。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 实例键必须与当前实例相关联且尚未完成。The instance key must be associated to the current instance and not be already completed.

Public Sub Execute (command As InstancePersistenceCommand, timeout As TimeSpan)

param.name: command

summary.span: 执行永久性命令。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永久性提供程序可使用此方法将子命令作为命令的一部分执行。A persistence provider can use this method to execute sub-commands as part of a command. 子命令将使用 TryCommand 执行，类似于传递到 InstanceStore.Execute 的命令。The sub-command will be executed using TryCommand, similar to commands passed to InstanceStore.Execute. 命令可以嵌套，但是一个命令不能同时执行多个子命令。Commands can be nested, but a command must not execute more than one sub-command at a time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceHandle As InstanceHandle

summary.span: 获取当前实例句柄。

span.span: Gets the current instance handle.
The current instance handle.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceVersion As Long
public: property long InstanceVersion { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前实例句柄对于当前实例所持有的锁的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the lock held on the current instance by the current instance handle.

value.span: 绑定到当前实例句柄的实例锁的版本，或 -1（如果句柄没有绑定到锁）。

span.span: The version of the instance lock bound to the current instance handle, or -1 if the handle isn’t bound to a lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用绑定到锁的句柄来执行需要锁的操作（如保存实例数据）时，永久性提供程序应将此值与对实例存储中实例所持有的锁的锁版本进行对照检查。The persistence provider should check this value against the lock version of the lock held on an instance in the instance store when performing an operation that requires a lock (such as persisting instance data) using a handle bound to the lock. 如果锁版本不匹配，则命令将失败，并引发 InstanceLockLostException。If the lock version doesn’t match, the command should fail with InstanceLockLostException.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceView As InstanceView

summary.span: 获取表示当前实例的内存中状态的实例视图对象。

span.span: Gets the instance view object that represents the in-memory state of the current instance.

summary.span: 此视图会在命令做出更新的同时反映这些更新。

span.span: This view reflects updates as they are made by the command in progress.
The instance view object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void LoadedInstance (System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState state, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> instanceData, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> instanceMetadata, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue>> associatedInstanceKeyMetadata, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue>> completedInstanceKeyMetadata);

span.span: Completed instance metadata as a dictionary of instance identifier and instance key metadata, which is a dictionary of and objects.

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经从实例存储中成功检索到当前实例。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully retrieved the current instance from the instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance. 如果实例句柄绑定到某个锁，或加载的实例标记为已完成，则将加载的数据视为一致，否则视为不确定。If the instance handle is bound to a lock or the loaded instance is marked as complete, the loaded data is considered to be consistent; otherwise, it is considered to be in doubt.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LockToken As Guid
public: property Guid LockToken { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 获取绑定到当前实例句柄的实例所有者的锁定标记。

span.span: Gets the lock token of the instance owner bound to the current instance handle.

value.span: 绑定到当前实例句柄的锁定标记，或 Guid.Empty（如果句柄没有绑定到实例所有者）。

span.span: The lock token bound to the current instance handle, or Guid.Empty if the handle isn’t bound to an instance owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用绑定到锁的句柄来执行需要锁的操作（如保存实例数据）时，永久性提供程序应将此值与对实例存储中实例所持有的锁的锁定标记进行对照检查。The persistence provider should check this value against the lock token of the lock held on an instance in the instance store when performing an operation that requires a lock (such as persisting instance data) using a handle bound to the lock. 如果锁定标记不匹配，则命令将失败，并引发 InstanceLockLostException。If the lock token doesn’t match, the command should fail with InstanceLockLostException. 获取实例上的新锁（如使用尚未绑定到锁的句柄来保存实例数据）时，永久性提供程序应将此值用作锁定标记。The persistence provider should use this value as the lock token when acquiring a new lock on an instance (such as persisting instance data using a handle not already bound to a lock). 如果实例已在实例存储中锁定，且锁定标记与此锁定标记匹配，则永久性提供程序可尝试使用 BindReclaimedLock 回收实例。If the instance is already locked in the instance store and the lock token matches this lock token, the persistence provider can attempt to reclaim the instance using BindReclaimedLock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PersistedInstance(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> data) cil managed
Public Sub PersistedInstance (data As IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue))

param.name: data
param.span: 作为 和 对象的字典的实例数据。

span.span: Instance data as a dictionary of and objects.

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经成功将一组实例数据保存到实例存储。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully persisted a set of instance data to the instance store.

summary.span: 如果尚未初始化实例，则此操作具有初始化的效果。

span.span: This has the effect of initializing the instance if it wasn’t already.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例以及该实例上的锁。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 每一组实例数据都会完全替换上一组实例数据。Each set of instance data completely replaces the previous set. 该组实例数据可以为 null，这与为空相同。The set of instance data may be null – this is the same as empty. 保存一组为 null 的实例数据会删除现有的实例数据组。Persisting a null set of instance data deletes the existing set of instance data. （保存一组实例数据并不会影响实例元数据。）(Persisting a set of instance data has no effect on instance metadata.)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void QueriedInstanceStore(class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStoreQueryResult queryResult) cil managed

param.name: queryResult
param.span: 对实例存储的查询的结果。

span.span: The results of a query against an instance store.

summary.span: 向 中的 对象列表中添加作为参数传递的 。

span.span: Adds the passed as a parameter to a list of objects in an .

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReadInstanceKeyMetadata (Guid key, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> metadata, bool complete);

.method public hidebysig instance void ReadInstanceKeyMetadata(valuetype System.Guid key, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> metadata, bool complete) cil managed
Public Sub ReadInstanceKeyMetadata (key As Guid, metadata As IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue), complete As Boolean)
public: void ReadInstanceKeyMetadata(Guid key, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstanceValue ^> ^ metadata, bool complete);

param.name: key
param.span: 已读取其元数据的键的实例键标识符。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key whose metadata was read.

param.span: 不得是 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

param.name: metadata
param.span: 作为 和 对象的字典的元数据。

span.span: The metadata as a dictionary of and objects.

param.name: complete
param.span: 如果该元数据代表与该实例键关联的所有元数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the metadata represents all of the metadata associated to the instance key, otherwise .

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经成功从实例存储读取与当前实例关联的键的一些实例键元数据。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully read some instance key metadata for a key associated to the current instance from the instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance. 如果实例句柄绑定到某个锁，或当前实例标记为已完成，则将元数据视为一致，否则视为不确定。If the instance handle is bound to a lock or the current instance is marked as complete, the metadata is considered to be consistent; otherwise, it is considered to be in doubt.

param.name: metadata

summary.span: 使用参数中传递的数据设置实例所有者元数据。

span.span: Sets the instance owner metadata using the data passed in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance. 如果实例句柄绑定到某个锁，或当前实例标记为已完成，则将元数据视为一致，否则视为不确定。If the instance handle is bound to a lock or the current instance is marked as complete, the metadata is considered to be consistent; otherwise, it is considered to be in doubt.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCancellationHandler(class System.Action`1<class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceContext> cancellationHandler) cil managed
Public Sub SetCancellationHandler (cancellationHandler As Action(Of InstancePersistenceContext))

param.name: cancellationHandler
param.span: 对要调用的函数的引用。

span.span: The reference to a function to be called.

summary.span: 设置要在请求取消某个操作时调用的取消处理程序。

span.span: Sets the cancellation handler to be called when the cancel of an operation is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用取消处理程序，则永久性提供程序应取消挂起的所有操作，并从 TryCommand 中引发 OperationCanceledException，以指示永久性命令尚未完成便被中断。If the cancellation handler is called, the persistence provider should cancel all pending operations and throw OperationCanceledException from TryCommand to indicate that the persistence command was interrupted before it could be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnassociatedInstanceKey(valuetype System.Guid key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 解除关联的键的实例键标识符。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key that has been unassociated.

param.span: 不得是 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 指示永久性提供程序已经成功将某个键与实例存储中的当前实例解除关联。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully disassociated a key from the current instance in the instance store.

summary.span: 该键的标识符将指定为参数。

span.span: The identifier of the key is specified as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例以及该实例上的锁。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 实例键必须与当前实例相关联且必须标记为完成。The instance key must be associated to the current instance and must be marked complete. 当前实例不得标记为完成。The current instance must not be marked complete.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserContext As Object
public: property System::Object ^ UserContext { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取附加到当前实例句柄的用户上下文信息。

span.span: Gets the user context information attached to the current instance handle.
The user context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该对象是从当前实例句柄的 InstanceStore.OnNewInstanceHandle 返回的对象。The object is the one that is returned from InstanceStore.OnNewInstanceHandle for the current instance handle.

param.name: key

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前实例句柄必须绑定到某个实例以及该实例上的锁。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 实例键必须与当前实例相关联且不得为完成。The instance key must be associated with the current instance and must not be completed.
